entries.content: FileBadgeGenerator error: `this.htmlEscaper.escape is not a function`. Issue in InlineFilePatternHandler.js:40 - HTMLEscaper instantiation problem. Need to verify HTMLEscaper implementation.

HTMLEscaper has STATIC methods (HTMLEscaper.escape), but InlineFilePatternHandler is instantiating it with `new HTMLEscaper()` and FileBadgeGenerator tries to call `this.htmlEscaper.escape()` as instance method. Need to either: 1) Pass the class itself (not instance), or 2) Convert HTMLEscaper to use instance methods instead of static.
